channel.title: Hack Club YSWS Programs
channel.description: Active "You Ship, We Ship" programs from Hack Club

item.title: Clutter
item.description:
You ship something to organize your digital life. We ship you a grant to buy something to organize your physical life.

Deadline: September 17, 2025

Join the discussion in #clutter

item.title: Penumbra
item.description:
Make shaders, and we'll ship you GPUs and posters!

Deadline: September 24, 2025

Penumbra is a YSWS, where you create shaders on ShaderToy, and get posters of your shaders shipped right to your doorstep! If you spend up to 45 hours across multiple ships, you'll be able to get a GPU like an RTX 3050!

Join the discussion in #penumbra

item.title: Waveform
item.description:
Make your own waveform visualizer, get a grant to buy music

Deadline: September 26, 2025

Join the discussion in #waveform

item.title: Fusering
item.description:
Design a keyring, get your keyring and a carabiner to hang it from!

Deadline: September 30, 2025

Join the discussion in #fusering

item.title: Summer of Making
item.description:
Build stuff. Get stuff. Repeat.

Deadline: September 30, 2025

Join the discussion in #summer-of-making

item.title: Shiba Arcade
item.description:
Make a game with Godot, earn SSS, and get invited to build an arcade in Tokyo (flight stipends available!)

Deadline: October 20, 2025

Shiba is a two-part adventure about game development. Create a game with Godot (an open-source game engine), earn SSS, use that for shop items, but most importantly, an invitation (and flight stipends) to Tokyo, Japan with 29 other Hack Clubbers to build a pop-up arcade!

Join the discussion in #shiba

item.title: Siege
item.description:
Code every week, get prizes. Make it to the end, get a framework!

Deadline: November 30, 2025

Join the discussion in #siege

item.title: birthday-cards
item.description:
You ship a birthday themed project we ship a birthday card!

Deadline: August 12, 2026

Join the discussion in #birthday-cards-ysws

item.title: iFrame
item.description:
Draw or edit images using any programming language and we will hang your custom image on HQ wall and send a copy to you

Join the discussion in #iframe

item.title: BakeBuild
item.description:
Design a cookie cutter, get it shipped!

You ship : A CAD model of a cookie cutter, we ship : A 3D printed model of your custom cookie cutter & cookies!

Join the discussion in #bakebuild

item.title: HackCraft
item.description:
Create a Minecraft mod, get Stickers, Minecraft or a server and terraria!

Join HackCraft to build and ship your own Minecraft mod. Access exclusive resources and a supportive community.

Join the discussion in #mc-modding

item.title: Sprig
item.description:
Build a JS game and play it on your own console.

Join the discussion in #sprig

item.title: Boba Drops
item.description:
Build a website and get boba!

Join the discussion in #boba
